entry.content:

Listing ID #: 162199

Property Type: Apartment
Bedrooms: 1.0
Bathrooms: 1.0

Brand new construction. This never lived in 1 bedroom off 30th Avenue offers a remarkable designer kitchen. Private balcony eastern exposure with tons of natural sunlight. Laundry in building. Featuring hardwood flooring throughout. Bedroom fits a king and has a large closet. Floor to ceiling tiling in the bath with deep soaking tub and large vanity with medicine cabinet. Stone counters in the kitchen and stainless steel appliances. Furnished roofdeck with NYC exposure. Steps to the 30th Avenue cafes, bars, and restaurants. Subway is steps away. Located on a quiet tree lined street with ample street parking. 7 minutes to Manhattan*** Contact your Astoria specialist today for a viewing.
